playlist.title: ? Gay Fun Show: Feast of Fools ?
playlist.description: Gay cocktails and politics with a sexy twist. Flaming blue rock star Fausto Fernós with his cute boyfriend Marc Felion talk with celebrities, musicians, and artists about news, culture and gossip. From Europe to Puerto Rico our correspondents comb the news to bring you the most outlandish oddities to squeal with delight! Listen to this top rated gay talk show takes a satirical slant on the typical NPR-style talk radio, and spins it into a raunchy, sassy, FCC-free portrait of modern life. Keywords: Sex, Seuxality, Comedy, Cooking, Cocktails, Gay, Queer, Lesbian, Transgendered, GLTB, Freaks, Fabulous. ODEO
